chrome_input_ime

Top-Level Variables
input_ime: ChromeInputIme
Classes
ChromeInputIme

Use the chrome.input.ime API to implement a custom IME for Chrome OS. This allows your extension to handle keystrokes, set the composition, and manage the candidate window.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeInputIme input_ime

Class ChromeInputIme

Fields

final Stream onActivate
final Stream onBlur

final Stream onDeactivated
final Stream onFocus

final Stream onKeyEvent
final Stream onMenuItemActivated
final Stream onReset
final Stream onSurroundingTextChanged

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onActivate

This event is sent when an IME is activated. It signals that the IME will be receiving onKeyPress events.

Stream<dynamic> get onBlur

This event is sent when focus leaves a text box. It is sent to all extensions that are listening to this event, and enabled by the user.

Stream<dynamic> get onCandidateClicked

This event is sent if this extension owns the active IME.

Stream<dynamic> get onDeactivated

This event is sent when an IME is deactivated. It signals that the IME will no longer be receiving onKeyPress events.

Stream<dynamic> get onFocus

This event is sent when focus enters a text box. It is sent to all extensions that are listening to this event, and enabled by the user.

Stream<dynamic> get onInputContextUpdate

This event is sent when the properties of the current InputContext change, such as the the type. It is sent to all extensions that are listening to this event, and enabled by the user.

Stream<dynamic> get onKeyEvent

This event is sent if this extension owns the active IME.

Stream<dynamic> get onMenuItemActivated

Called when the user selects a menu item

Stream<dynamic> get onReset

This event is sent when chrome terminates ongoing text input session.

Stream<dynamic> get onSurroundingTextChanged

Called when the editable string around caret is changed or when the caret position is moved. The text length is limited to 100 characters for each back and forth direction.

Methods

void clearComposition(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Clear the current composition. If this extension does not own the active IME, this fails. callback Called when the operation completes with a boolean indicating if the text was accepted or not. On failure, chrome.runtime.lastError is set.

void commitText(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Commits the provided text to the current input. callback Called when the operation completes with a boolean indicating if the text was accepted or not. On failure, chrome.runtime.lastError is set.

void deleteSurroundingText(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Deletes the text around the caret. callback Called when the operation completes.

void keyEventHandled(String requestId, bool response)

Indicates that the key event received by onKeyEvent is handled. This should only be called if the onKeyEvent listener is asynchronous. requestId Request id of the event that was handled. This should come from keyEvent.requestId response True if the keystroke was handled, false if not

void setCandidateWindowProperties(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Sets the properties of the candidate window. This fails if the extension doesn’t own the active IME

callback Called when the operation completes.

void setCandidates(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Sets the current candidate list. This fails if this extension doesn’t own the active IME

callback Called when the operation completes.

void setComposition(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Set the current composition. If this extension does not own the active IME, this fails. callback Called when the operation completes with a boolean indicating if the text was accepted or not. On failure, chrome.runtime.lastError is set.

void setCursorPosition(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Set the position of the cursor in the candidate window. This is a no-op if this extension does not own the active IME. callback Called when the operation completes

void setMenuItems(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Adds the provided menu items to the language menu when this IME is active. callback

void updateMenuItems(dynamic parameters, dynamic callback)

Updates the state of the MenuItems specified callback Called when the operation completes
